metadata.title: CVE-2023-31082 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in drivers/tty/n_gsm.c in the Linuxkernel 6.2. There is a sleeping function called from an invalid context ingsmld_write, which will block the kernel. Note: This has been disputed by3rd parties as not a valid vulnerability.

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-11-14').

linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
